doc.name: CanBusPriority
doc.description: This actor is a ptolemy.actor.lib.Transformer designed for use with the ptolemy.actor.lib.aspect.CanBus. This actor comes with a parameter CanId that sets the priority of the output port that it 'covers'. To improve visibility this parameter is made visible using a BoxedValueIcon. For more information see: CAN bus simulator using Quantity Manager.
doc.author: D. Marciano, P. Derler
